Overview


OUR #1 SERUM

The culmination of over 150 years of Japanese skincare innovation. Discover 3 visible changes in 3 days: radiance, resilience, and
smoothness*. Ultimune face serum is powered by collagen-supporting peptides as well as nourishing and smoothing antioxidants to
strengthen skin’s protective barrier, leaving it smoother and plumper. Smooth fine lines in just 4 weeks** with Ultimune Power
Infusing Serum. Now available in a refill size.


BENEFITS:

 * Boosts radiance, resilience, and smoothness
 * Reduces signs of aging
 * Improves hydration
 * Enhances the efficacy of other skincare products
 * Winner of 238 global beauty awards
 * Refill helps reduce plastic waste by up to 95% compared to a regular product
 * Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

*Consumer tested by 103 women.
**Consumer tested

HOW TO USE

 * Use Ultimune after cleansing and softening skin, but before applying other serums or moisturizers.
 * Pump twice onto fingertips and smooth evenly over face and neck.
 * Use Ultimune twice daily, morning and evening.

A good makeup cleanser to refresh your face at the end of the day is vital to every skincare routine.

Makeup removers and cleansers are often confused. However, there are some subtle but important differences between these two types
of products. Makeup remover is an all-purpose tool for removing foundations, blushes,

metadata.title: Cleansers & Makeup Removers | SHISEIDO
metadata.description: Shop gentle face cleansers and makeup removers for all skin types, the first step in your skincare routine and get free samples on every order.

pageContent:
cleansers are often confused. However, there are some subtle but important differences between these two types
of products. Makeup remover is an all-purpose tool for removing foundations, blushes, concealers and other cosmetics. Cleansers
are designed to remove grime, sweat and all other impurities that can react with bacteria and cause your skin to break out. Your
individual skin will influence what kind of makeup removers and cleansers you need.

To keep your complexion as clear as can be, you can rely on a great eye makeup [/makeup/eyes/] remover like Shiseido Essentials
Instant Eye and Lip Makeup Remover
[https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/essentials-instant-eye-and-lip-makeup-remover-0730852143449.html] to remove waterproof and
longwearing makeup.

For makeup removers that can be used on wet or dry skin, try the Shiseido Essentials Perfect Cleansing Oil
[https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/essentials-perfect-cleansing-oil-9990000000122.html], to easily clean and thoroughly remove dirt
and

Overview


DESCRIPTION

This gentle cleanser starts as a cushiony gel texture to grab onto impurities and transforms into a silky oil to remove even
waterproof makeup, without stripping skin of its essential moisture. Skin feels fresh, balanced, and revitalized with a radiant
finish.


KEY BENEFITS

 * Effortlessly removes impurities and waterproof makeup.
 * Reveals ultra clean, radiant skin.
 * Leverages the gentleness of a gel base with the cleansing power of an oil base.
 * Maintains moisture and does not leave skin feeling tight or dry.
 * Outer cap is made of 30% upcycled rice husk*. Tube is made of 10% sugarcane-derived polyethylene.
 * Vegan. Cruelty-free. Fragrance-free.
 * Dermatologist-tested. Opthamologist-tested.

*Cap contains natural materials that may change color or texture over time. This does not affect product quality.


RESULTS

Immediately

metadata.title: SHIKULIME Gel-to-Oil Cleanser | Shiseido
metadata.description: Shop Shiseido's 2-in-1 face cleanser and makeup remover that washes away impurities, without drying skin. Keep your skin feeling revitalized with a radiant finish.

pageContent:
* Dermatologist-tested. Opthamologist-tested.

*Cap contains natural materials that may change color or texture over time. This does not affect product quality.


RESULTS

Immediately after use,

 * 95% agree this cleanser does not dry out skin
 * 93% agree skin looks softer
 * 90% agree skin looks more supple

* Tested by 101 women.




HOW TO USE

Use daily, in the morning and evening as the first step in your skincare routine.

 * Apply without wetting hands or face.
 * Squeeze a cherry-sized drop onto fingertips and massage over dry face to remove makeup and impurities.
 * Rinse thoroughly with cool or lukewarm water.




KEY INGREDIENTS



 * Shikuwasa, Japanese Lime from Okinawa: Supports skin’s moisture barrier to promote a healthy look.
 * Safflower Oil & Grape Seed Oil: Dissolves makeup and sebum while providing moisture.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

Clinically proven to protect skin's moisture before and after cleansing for 2 weeks* this gentle, moisturizing cleanser is infused
with effective ingredients to for those with dry and sensitive skin. Deeply moisturize and balance skin, prepping it for further
skincare treatment.

Japanese Yuzu Seed Extract provides moisturizing benefits while exclusive InternalPowerResist technology strengthens skin and
defends against environmental pollutants*. This gentle, soap-free cleanser is ideal for dry/very dry/sensitive skin. Gently
cleanse for hydrated, softened skin.
*Tested by 110 women

Dry / Very Dry / Sensitive skin. DERMATOLOGIST TESTED.

Clinically proven to protect skin's moisture before and after cleansing when product is used daily for 2 weeks*

* When product used daily. Tested by 32 women


HOW TO USE

metadata.title: Extra Rich Cleansing Milk | SHISEIDO
metadata.description: Shop Shiseido's Extra Rich Cleansing Milk for dry skin. It's a gentle foaming cleanser that hydrates for deeply moisturized skin.

pageContent:
DERMATOLOGIST TESTED.

Clinically proven to protect skin's moisture before and after cleansing when product is used daily for 2 weeks*

* When product used daily. Tested by 32 women


HOW TO USE

 * Push the pump 2-3 times to dispense cleanser into the palm of hand and gently smooth over the skin. Add small amounts of cold
   or lukewarm water to lather well and cleanse the skin. Rinse thoroughly.
 * Recommended Pairings: Revitalizing Treatment Softener
   [https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/extra-rich-cleansing-milk-for-dry-skin-0730852145306.html]


KEY INGREDIENTS

 * Signature Japanese Ingredients
    * Kirishima Mineral Spring Water helps supplement skin’s essential minerals.
    * Rice Germ Oil softens and wraps skin in a veil of moisture.
    * Japanese Yuzu Seed Extract helps improve skin’s moisture.

 * InternalPowerResist technology featuring ImuCalm Compound™ helps to strengthen the skin barrier while Hamamelis Extract
   provides a high antioxidant effect.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

Cleanse and balance skin with this daily foaming face wash infused with signature Japanese ingredients. White Clay absorbs excess
oil, Yomogi Extract prevents roughness, Rice Germ Oil softens, and pure Kirishima Mineral Spring Water helps supplement skin’s
essential minerals.


RESULTS

Immediately after use,

 * 94% felt the product softens skin and lifts away dirt and impurities
 * 90% felt the product removes pollutants

After 2 weeks,

 * 86% felt the product improves skin's radiance
 * 86% felt the product promotes smooth absorption of skincare treatments that follow

*Tested by 106 women.


BENEFITS

 * Clarifies and balances skin
 * Removes dirt and pollutants without stripping skin of essential moisture
 * Promotes skin radiance
 * Lathers and rinses off easily
 * Good for all skin types.
 *

metadata.title: Clarifying Cleansing Foam | Shiseido.com
metadata.description: Clarifying Cleansing Foam | A rich, creamy foaming cleanser for all skin types.

pageContent:
* Clarifies and balances skin
 * Removes dirt and pollutants without stripping skin of essential moisture
 * Promotes skin radiance
 * Lathers and rinses off easily
 * Good for all skin types.
 * Dermatologist-tested.


HOW TO USE

 * Use daily, in the morning and evening as the first step in your skincare routine.
 * Wet skin with lukewarm water. Dispense a pearl-sized amount of cleanser onto dampened hands and rub hands together to create a
   lather.
 * Massage over your face with gentle circular motions, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.


KEY INGREDIENTS

White Clay: Absorbs excess sebum and impurities.

Yomogi Extract: Prevents skin roughness and promotes radiance.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

Get a clean start on your day with the refreshing benefits of this 2-in-1, foaming daily face wash. Efficient and energizing, it
effectively removes dirt, oil, and debris, doing double duty as a shaving cream too.


HOW TO USE

 * Take a dime-size amount of cleanser onto the palm of your hand.
 * Add small amounts of cold or lukewarm water to work up a rich lather.
 * Apply the foam onto face using gentle circular motions to clean.
 * Rinse thoroughly.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

A light, oil-free instant foaming cleanser infused with effective ingredients to help soften and remove impurities. This creamy
foam feels gentle on skin, prepping it for further skincare treatment.

Rice Germ Oil softens and moisturizes skin while exclusive InternalPowerResist technology strengthens skin and defends against
environmental pollutants*. Ideal for all skin types this light and airy foam leaves skin feeling smooth and hydrated, with
enhanced clarity.
*Tested by 100 women

All Skin Types. DERMATOLOGIST TESTED.

 * 94% felt it created a rich lather that lasted in its consistency, even when it was applied to the skin.

After 1 week of regular use:

 * 87% felt the product softens the skin.

After 2 weeks of regular use:

 * 97% felt the product had a moisturizing effect.

* Tested by 100 women


HOW TO USE

 * Push the pump 2-3

of regular use:

After 2 weeks of regular use:

* Tested by 100 women


HOW TO USE

 * Push the pump 2-3 times to dispense foam into the palm of hand and gently smooth over the skin to cleanse.
 * Rinse thoroughly.
 * Can be used as a makeup remover. For hard-to-remove makeup, use on dry face using dry hands. (For waterproof mascara, an eye
   makeup remover is recommended.)
 * Recommend Pairings: Treatment Softener
   [https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/treatment-softener-for-normal-and-combination-to-oily-skin-9990000000196.html] or Treatment
   Softener Enriched
   [https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/treatment-softener-enriched-for-normal-dry-and-very-dry-skin-9990000000197.html]

    * Rice Germ Oil softens and wraps skin in a veil of moisture.

pageContent:
INGREDIENTS

 * Signature Japanese Ingredients
    * Kirishima Mineral Spring Water helps supplement skin’s essential minerals.
    * Rice Germ Oil softens and wraps skin in a veil of moisture.

 * InternalPowerResist technology featuring ImuCalm Compound™ helps to strengthen the skin barrier while Hamamelis Extract
   provides a high antioxidant effect.
 * Hydro-Wrap Vitalizing DE 7 makes the foam become denser and creamier, maintaining its shape even when it mixes with impurities
   (oil) and makeup to thoroughly cleanse.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

A gentle, dual-phase makeup remover that immediately dissolves waterproof and long-wearing eye makeup and lipstick. Leaves skin
feeling fresh and smooth without any oily sensation.Removes all makeup with ease, including waterproof mascara.

Dermatologist-Tested. Ophthalmologist-Tested. Non-Comedogenic.


HOW TO USE

To Use: Shake well. Saturate a cotton pad and hold in place over eye area or lips. Wipe away gently.


KEY INGREDIENTS

Xylitol retains essential moisture in the delicate eye and lip areas.

VIEW FULL INGREDIENTS LIST [https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/0730852114920-full-ingredients.html]

Overview


DESCRIPTION

This foolproof eyeliner is infused with high-impact pigments that deliver smudge-proof, saturated, matte color. The weightless,
inky pencil features thermo-sensory technology that allows this formula to transform from a solid to a liquid upon contact with
skin, creating a flexible, water-resistant film that lasts up to 24 hours. The micro-thin lead on this next-generation pencil can
be dotted between lashes or glided across eyes with remarkable precision and no skipping. Available in five shades inspired by
sumi ink sticks used in traditional Japanese calligraphy. Dermatologist and ophthalmologist-tested.


HOW TO USE

Twist up the tip approximately one millimeter (one or two clicks) and glide across lash lines.


KEY INGREDIENTS

Thermo-Sensory Gel: Reacts to

Dermatologist and ophthalmologist-tested.


HOW TO USE

Twist up the tip approximately one millimeter (one or two clicks) and glide across lash lines.


KEY INGREDIENTS

Thermo-Sensory Gel: Reacts to skin’s temperature and transforms into an ink-like texture with incredible precision. Surface-coated
Pigments: Provide intense color payoff. Film Former: Prevents formula from smudging or streaking.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

This 4-in-1 eye pencil acts as a liner, kajal, eyeshadow, and brow color. The smudge-proof, crease-proof, waterproof, and
tear-proof formula provides high-impact pigment with an even glide and a featherweight feel. Its soft, graduated point is precise
enough to create a thin, smooth band along the inner

metadata.title: 4 in 1 Kajal Eyeliner, Eyeshadow & Eyebrow Pencil | SHISEIDO
metadata.description: A multi-use, 4-in-1, eye pencil with kajal eyeliner, eyebrow pencil, & eyeshadow stick all-in-one, highly pigmented, long-wearing, beauty product.

pageContent:
waterproof, and
tear-proof formula provides high-impact pigment with an even glide and a featherweight feel. Its soft, graduated point is precise
enough to create a thin, smooth band along the inner rim of the eye, and also wide enough to be easily swathed across the entire
lid. A detachable sharpener maintains the tip for ultimate precision, while a built-in sponge can be used to blend for a seamless,
smoky finish. Available in 10 shades inspired by ancient and modern Japan. Dermatologist and ophthalmologist-tested.


HOW TO USE

Apply along the waterline or lash line to define eyes, or use the soft, graduated point to fill in lids or brows. For a smoky
effect, diffuse the pigment with the sponge blender. Reshape the tip for precise application every time using the built-in
sharpener.


KEY INGREDIENTS

Solid Polymer and Texturizing Wax Blend: Offers a seamless glide and easy blendability. Spherical Silicone Powders: Lend the
formula a velvety texture and a soft-focus finish.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

This innovative mascara balances bold, buildable volume with masterful precision and exceptional control. The unique brush design
features two concave sides to boost volume and two flat sides for extra lift. Lashes are wrapped in a weightless, clump-, flake-,
and smudge-resistant formula that lasts 24 hours.

+250% volume and +47% length in just one coat.*

Available in 4 graphic shades. Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.

*Based on an in-vitro study on bare lashes.


HOW TO USE

Starting at the base of the lashes, use the flat side of the brush to deposit product from root to tips with lifting motions.
Rotate the brush and use the curved side to separate lashes and build additional volume.


KEY INGREDIENTS



 * Memory flex bristles: Maintain shape and

Overview


DESCRIPTION

Handcrafted by Japanese artisans, this semi-circular tool features Hidden Core Technology to help maintain its shape over time and
prevent skipping or streaking. The synthetic bristles allow for use with any texture, including powders, creams, and gels.


HOW TO USE

Pat the flat side of the brush across lids to deposit pigment and increase color saturation. The semi-circular shape also fits
snuggly along the top and lower lash lines, to create a seamless smoky eye.


HOW TO CLEAN

Spray brush cleaner on tissue and gently wipe brush against tissue. Repeat as needed until clean.


KEY INGREDIENTS

 * Ergonomic Design: Crafted to fit comfortably in the hand, the modern design makes for controlled application.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

This innovative mascara gives lashes major length, volume, and definition. The unique brush features a rigid core surrounded by
flexible silicone bristles and a unique crown tip that can grab hard-to-reach lashes near the inner corners of eyes and bulk up
bottom lashes. The ultra-fine crushed pigments and precise blend of waxes wrap each lash in a weightless, smudge-proof formula
that lasts all day. Available in black. Dermatologist and ophthalmologist-tested.


HOW TO USE

Starting at the roots, use a zig-zag motion to coat lashes completely. For added intensity and definition, build up and separate
lashes with the crown tip. Use Essentials Instant Eye and Lip Makeup

KEY INGREDIENTS

Ultra-Fine Crushed Pigments: Provide high coverage and maximum impact. Wax Blend: Creates the perfect texture for defining lashes
without clumps. Film Former: Prevents pigment from smudging and offers 12-hour wear.

metadata.description: A professionally detailed eye makeup brush designed with flat & fine bristles to pick up any eye formula & precisely apply for any small makeup detail.

pageContent:
to wishlist


Read More


Free Shipping & Free Samples with Every Order

Overview


DESCRIPTION

The chiseled roof shape made entirely of synthetic bristles easily defines brows and fits perfectly along the lash lines. Simply
stamp powders, inks, dews, or gels across the rim of the eye to build a seamless band of pigment. Handcrafted in Japan, a
revolutionary hidden core maintains the tool’s shape and creates the perfect balance of strength, flexibility, and control for
precise detail work.


HOW TO USE

Hold the brush at a 90-degree angle from your face for a thin line. For a thicker, bolder result, hold the brush at a 45-degree
angle.


HOW TO CLEAN

Spray brush cleaner on tissue and gently wipe brush against tissue. Repeat as needed until clean.


KEY INGREDIENTS

Hidden Core Technology: Densely packed bristles create a sturdy interior that is surrounded by a perimeter of soft, flexible
fibers for easy blending and a streak-free finish. Synthetic Bristles: Compatible with all

fibers for easy blending and a streak-free finish. Synthetic Bristles: Compatible with all makeup textures, these animal-friendly
fibers feature tapered tips that conform to fine lines and facial contours. Ergonomic Design: Crafted to fit comfortably in the
hand, the modern design makes for controlled application.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

FOR FULLER, DENSER-LOOKING LASHES AND BROWS.

A high-performance serum with sophisticated technology for elegantly long, thick-looking lashes and visibly full brows. This
powerful, hydrating formula helps prevent lashes and brows from looking sparse, short and thin. Eyelashes and eyebrows appear
fuller, healthier and rich with shine.

Denser-looking lashes:

 * 80% after 16 weeks*
 * 65% after 8 weeks*

Fuller-looking lashes:

 * 79% after 16 weeks*
 * 65% after 8 weeks*

Lashes became visibly more beautiful:

 * 84% after 16 weeks*
 * 71% after 8 weeks*

*Based on an independent US consumer study by 100 women.

Dermatologist-Tested.


HOW TO USE

Designed with a flocked tip applicator to comfortably reach small areas between lashes and into lash line. Use morning and night
after skincare.


KEY INGREDIENTS

Arginine helps restore

Free Shipping & Free Samples with Every Order

Overview


DESCRIPTION

This 3-in-1 tool features a slim, retractable pencil that defines and shapes brows, creating a natural look with ultra-fine
hair-like strokes. The center opens to reveal a sponge-tip applicator pre-loaded with a featherweight powder that effortlessly
fills in sparse areas and adds depth minus hard edges. Finally, a

metadata.title: Brow InkTrio: 3-In-1 Eyebrow Pencil With Brush | SHISEIDO
metadata.description: A multi-use, 3-in-1, eyebrow pencil, eyebrow filler with powder, & eyebrow brush that delivers defined, soft or bold, brows in a single beauty product.

pageContent:
strokes. The center opens to reveal a sponge-tip applicator pre-loaded with a featherweight powder that effortlessly
fills in sparse areas and adds depth minus hard edges. Finally, a built-in brush conveniently blends and grooms for a polished
finish. This long-wear formula resists sweat, smudging, and water. Available in four neutral shades that suit every skin tone and
hair color. Dermatologist and ophthalmologist-tested.


HOW TO USE

Brush up brows with the spooly brush. Then, fill in the shape with the retractable pencil end and/or the twist-open powder sponge
at the center of the pencil. Finish by combing through hair to blend the pigment and set arches in place.


KEY INGREDIENTS

Multidimensional Pigments: Tonal pearls in the powder lend a natural sheen to brows. Ester Oil: Lends the powder superior glide
for a smooth application. Natural Waxes: Provides the pencil with structure for extreme precision.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

Diagonally-cut, synthetic bristles suit any eye shape and can be used to define, blend, and diffuse cream, powder, and gel
formulas. These high-performing fibers provide a cushioning effect, while a revolutionary hidden core maintains the tool’s shape
and creates the perfect balance of strength and flexibility. Handcrafted in Japan, this ultra-soft brush brilliantly deposits
color and quickly diffuses any hard edges.


HOW TO USE

Use the rounded tip to build coverage, contour the crease of the eye, or blend color.


HOW TO CLEAN

Spray brush cleaner on tissue and gently wipe brush against tissue. Repeat as needed until clean.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

Handcrafted by Japanese artisans, this brush is ideal for detail work and drawing precise lines or graphic shapes. Features
SHISEIDO's Hidden Core Technology for a smooth and even application. The triangular-shaped handle offers an ergonomic grip, while
the tapered point delivers superior stability and control. The combination of soft and firm synthetic fibers allow this brush to
be used with creams, gels, liquids, and powders.


HOW TO USE

Use the angled point to trace along top and bottom lash lines, highlight the inner corners of the eyes, or even define brows.
Perfect for creating precise cat-eyes and other expressive shapes.


HOW TO CLEAN

Spray brush cleaner on tissue and gently wipe brush against tissue. Repeat as needed until clean.


KEY INGREDIENTS

KEY INGREDIENTS

 * Hidden Core Technology: Densely packed bristles create a sturdy interior that is surrounded by a perimeter of soft, flexible
   fibers for easy blending and a streak-free finish.
 * Synthetic Bristles: Compatible with all makeup textures, these animal-friendly fibers feature tapered tips that conform facial
   contours.
 * Ergonomic Design: Crafted to fit comfortably in the hand, the modern design makes for controlled application.

Free Shipping & Free Samples with Every Order

Overview


DESCRIPTION

The micro-fine, arched tip and ergonomic design create an entirely new-yet-intuitive gesture for applying eyeliner and eliminate
the once-unavoidable blind spot that is often created by the user’s hand or the pen itself. Saturated with a high level of
ultra-black pigment, this revolutionary flow-through liner delivers a precise, quick-dry formula that provides up to 24 hours of
waterproof, smudge-proof and tear-proof color. Available in black. Dermatologist and ophthalmologist-tested.


HOW TO USE

Shake well with cap on before each use. For a fine line, hold the angled tip down and trace along the lashes. To

metadata.title: ArchLiner Ink - Shibui Black | Shiseido.com
metadata.description: A liquid liner with a micro-precision tip lasting up to 24 hours

pageContent:
color. Available in black. Dermatologist and ophthalmologist-tested.


HOW TO USE

Shake well with cap on before each use. For a fine line, hold the angled tip down and trace along the lashes. To increase the
thickness, hold the angled tip sideways against the lash line and gently pull out toward the edge of the eye. Create the illusion
of thicker lashes by dotting the ultra-fine tip between hairs. For a foolproof cat eye, press the tip against the outer corner of
the eye to create a perfect wing every time.


KEY INGREDIENTS

Pure Black Pigment: Provides bold, ink-like intensity. Waterproof Polymers: Offers up to 24 hours of waterproof and
sweat-resistant color.

VIEW FULL INGREDIENTS LIST [https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/0729238147324-full-ingredients.html]

Overview


DESCRIPTION

This waterproof mascara give lashes major lift, length, volume, and definition. The innovative brush features a rigid core
surrounded by flexible silicone bristles and a unique crown tip that can grab hard-to-reach

metadata.title: ImperialLash MascaraInk Waterproof - Sumi Black | Shiseido.com

pageContent:
mascara give lashes major lift, length, volume, and definition. The innovative brush features a rigid core
surrounded by flexible silicone bristles and a unique crown tip that can grab hard-to-reach lashes near the inner corners of eyes
and bulk up bottom lashes minus clumps. The ultra-fine crushed pigments and precise blend of waxes wrap each lash in a weightless,
smudge-proof, clump-proof formula that lasts all day. Available in black. Dermatologist and ophthalmologist-tested.


HOW TO USE

Starting at the roots, use a zig-zag motion to coat lashes completely. For added intensity and definition, build up and separate
lashes with the crown tip.


KEY INGREDIENTS

Ultra-Fine Crushed Pigments: Provide high coverage and maximum impact. Wax Blend: Creates the perfect texture for defining lashes
without clumps. Film Former: Prevents smudging and offers 12 hours of waterproof color.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

This luxurious anti-aging cream revives and brightens eyes, targets the appearance of dullness, dark circles, sagging, wrinkles,
and tension between the eyebrows. Formulated with our rare Legendary Enmei Complex and SublimActive to support the natural cycle
of cellular turnover. This luxurious moisturizing eye cream absorbs smoothly and renews the skin around the eyes with a blend of
rare ingredients

metadata.title: Future Solution LX Legendary Enmei Ultimate Brilliance Eye Cream | Shiseido

pageContent:
Complex and SublimActive to support the natural cycle
of cellular turnover. This luxurious moisturizing eye cream absorbs smoothly and renews the skin around the eyes with a blend of
rare ingredients that target multiple signs of aging, help strengthen the skin’s barrier, and help promote collagen production.
Bring the ultimate brilliance to eyes for a timeless luminosity and vibrant, youthful-looking eyes. Features a Magatama eye
massager, made out of high-grade porcelain, to further soothe and relax muscles around the eyes.


RESULTS

After 8 weeks*,
 * 92% said eye area looks brighter, more resilient and firmer.
 * 86% said eye area puffiness was visibly improved.
 * 81% said eye area looks more lifted.

*Consumer tested by 107 subjects.


BENEFITS

Legendary Enmei Complex: a proprietary anti-aging ingredient compromised of Legendary Enmei Herb and Green Treasured Silk, slows
down the appearance of visible signs of aging, and inhibits the reduction of antioxidant factors.

Camellia

metadata.title: Future Solution LX Legendary Enmei Ultimate Brilliance Eye Cream | Shiseido

pageContent:
anti-aging ingredient compromised of Legendary Enmei Herb and Green Treasured Silk, slows
down the appearance of visible signs of aging, and inhibits the reduction of antioxidant factors.

Camellia Seed Extract: known to help support the natural cycle of cellular turnover.

Akoya Pearl Shell Extract: reduces skin dullness and soothes skin.

Iris Root Extract: visibly improves sagging.

Shikwasa Extract: improves declined skin barrier function.

4MSK: helps prevents and improves the look of dark spots.


HOW TO USE

 * Use the narrow end of the tool to scoop cream and place on fingertip.
 * Dab on five areas (inner corners, under eyes, outer corners, eyelids, above and between the eyebrows) around each eye and
   smooth with fingers.
 * Blend cream into skin by circling fingers around eyes 3 times. Then, massage around the entire area 3 times.

How to use tool
 * Massage the area between the eyebrows using circular motions.
 * Glide tool from under the eyebrows upward toward the

metadata.title: Future Solution LX Legendary Enmei Ultimate Brilliance Eye Cream | Shiseido

pageContent:
eyes 3 times. Then, massage around the entire area 3 times.

How to use tool
 * Massage the area between the eyebrows using circular motions.
 * Glide tool from under the eyebrows upward toward the hairline. Repeat across the entire area 2-3 times.
 * Glide tool from the upper eyelids to the temples and from the lower eyelids to the temples. Repeat on each side 1-2 times.
   Glide gently and smoothly, without force.
 * Press the 5 acupressure points.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

Reveal your inner strength with radiant eyes. This eye serum makes the eye area brighter, smoother, and hydrates for 24 hours.
Newly infused with 10x concentrated extracts** of ImuGenerationRED Technology™, Ultimune Eye strengthens skin’s defenses and
supports the delivery of vital nutrients to the skin. Gentle on the delicate eye area, this non-sticky, refreshing formula
supports the natural production of collagen for a more rested and youthful appearance.


RESULTS

 * In 1 week, 96% felt dark circles were less visible
 * In 4 weeks, 100% felt the eye area was more radiant, smooth, and resilient
 * In 7 weeks (1 bottle), 100% felt wrinkles and fine lines of the eye area were less visible

*Tested by 102 women.


BENEFITS

 * Boosts radiance in 3 days*
 * Visibly diminishes

Overview


DESCRIPTION

This eye and lip cream is a luxurious treatment specially formulated to treat the delicate skin around the eyes and lips, which is
especially susceptible to signs of aging. This formula prevents and smooths the appearance of fine lines, reduces puffiness, and
diminishes dark circles, with 24-hours of rich, lasting hydration.

Future Solution LX contains our highest concentration of SkingenecellEnmei Complex—powered by the mystical Enmei Herb—an exclusive
anti-aging ingredient that slows down the appearance of visible signs of aging, for a perceivable difference in skin.


BENEFITS

 * Diminishes the appearance of dark circles and crepiness
 * Leaves a radiant finish
 * Prevents the look of wrinkles, sagging, and puffiness
 * Delivers 24 hours of rich moisture
 * Rich, hydrating texture absorbs instantly
 * Dermatologist-tested
 * Ophthalmologist-tested


HOW TO USE

 * Apply twice daily—morning and evening.
 * Scoop two

metadata.title: Future Solution LX Eye and Lip Contour Regenerating Cream | SHISEIDO
metadata.description: FUTURE SOLUTION LX Eye and Lip Contour Regenerating Cream.  An anti-aging restoring treatment must for every skincare regimen that addresses visible signs of aging.

pageContent:
Delivers 24 hours of rich moisture
 * Rich, hydrating texture absorbs instantly
 * Dermatologist-tested
 * Ophthalmologist-tested


HOW TO USE

 * Apply twice daily—morning and evening.
 * Scoop two rice-sized amounts and blend between ring fingers. Then smooth the cream around your entire eye and lip areas.
 * Use your ring fingers to gently massage the cream in a circular motion around each eye. Repeat 6 times.
 * For added benefits: Glide your fingers lightly over and under eyelids and toward temples. Repeat 6 times.
 * Then, place your fingers above your lips and stretch the upper lip outward. Next, place your fingers below the lips and pull up
   on the corners of the lower lips. Lift and repeat 6 times.


KEY INGREDIENTS

Enmei Herb Extract: Restores and prolongs skin’s beauty and visibly minimizes signs of aging.

Houttuynia Cordata Extract: Targets puffiness and firms skin for a vibrant eye area.

VIEW FULL INGREDIENTS LIST

Overview


DESCRIPTION

ENHANCE RADIANCE AND BRIGHTNESS AROUND THE EYES.

Infusing freshness and radiance into the eye area, this intensive eye cream effectively targets two major causes of dark circles:
pigmentation and poor microcirculation. Blue and brown dark circles are visibly reduced over time for a youthful look.

Dermatologist-Tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.


HOW TO USE

To Use: Apply each morning and night as the last step in your skincare routine.


KEY INGREDIENTS

 * Shiseido-exclusive Dark Circle Diminisher defies dark circles three ways by helping to target their root cause, preventing
   their formation, and addressing microcirculation in the eye area to infuse freshness and radiance into skin
 * Humectant-rich Super Hydro-Synergy Complex N helps instantly hydrates skin and maintains moisture for hours

VIEW FULL INGREDIENTS LIST

Use White Lucent Anti-Dark Circles Eye Cream as your morning and/or evening eye care treatment. Smooth over the delicate eye area
to help combat visible signs of aging, fatigue and dehydration.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

Created in 1897 and rooted in Japanese Beauty rituals, Eudermine was a favorite of geishas who used it to protect skin under heavy
makeup. With a double dose of Hyaluronic Acid, the ultra-hydrating formula drenches skin in moisture, and Vitamin C brightens and
evens complexion. The lightweight texture revitalizes, nourishes, and

metadata.title: Eudermine Activating & Hydrating Essence | SHISEIDO
metadata.description: Eudermine Hydrating Essence infuses skin with Hyaluronic Acid for 24 hours of deep hydration. Discover Shiseido's innovative Hydrating Essence!

pageContent:
With a double dose of Hyaluronic Acid, the ultra-hydrating formula drenches skin in moisture, and Vitamin C brightens and
evens complexion. The lightweight texture revitalizes, nourishes, and softens skin—an essential step in any Japanese Beauty
skincare routine.


RESULTS

 * Instantly boosts skin’s radiance by 17%.
 * In 4 weeks, pores, blemishes and dullness become less visible.
 * In 4 weeks, skin becomes visibly smoother by 21%.

*Tested by 33 women.

After 3 weeks of regular use of Ultimune Power Infusing Serum, Eudermine Activating Essence and Essential Energy Hydrating
Cream**:
 * 94% said skin feels more resilient.
 * 96% said skin looks more radiant.
 * 94% said skin tone looks more even.

**Tested by 101 women.


BENEFITS

 * Infuses skin with two types of Hyaluronic Acid to stay moisturized for 24 hours.
 * Targets dark spots and brightens skin with Vitamin C.
 * Promotes skin's turnover cycle while strengthening the barrier function with exclusive prebiotic Fermented

metadata.title: Eudermine Activating & Hydrating Essence | SHISEIDO
metadata.description: Eudermine Hydrating Essence infuses skin with Hyaluronic Acid for 24 hours of deep hydration. Discover Shiseido's innovative Hydrating Essence!

pageContent:
stay moisturized for 24 hours.
 * Targets dark spots and brightens skin with Vitamin C.
 * Promotes skin's turnover cycle while strengthening the barrier function with exclusive prebiotic Fermented Kefir Extract.
 * Recharges moisture with Yuzu Extract.
 * Revolutionary packaging combines the bottle forming and filling process into one step, helping reduce CO2* and refill system
   helps reduce plastic by 92%.
   *Compared to other manufacturing methods.




HOW TO USE

 * Apply daily, in the morning and evening after cleansing.
 * Apply with Shiseido’s 100% natural Japanese Facial Cotton for additional exfoliation and absorption allowing for maximum
   benefits.
 * Saturate Shiseido Facial Cotton with a quarter-sized amount of essence.
 * Smooth gently over skin. For an even more effective application, tap gently into skin with your fingers to increase activation.
 * For Refill [https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/eudermine-activating-essence-refill-0729238196483.html]: To refill, remove

metadata.title: Eudermine Activating & Hydrating Essence | SHISEIDO
metadata.description: Eudermine Hydrating Essence infuses skin with Hyaluronic Acid for 24 hours of deep hydration. Discover Shiseido's innovative Hydrating Essence!

pageContent:
application, tap gently into skin with your fingers to increase activation.
 * For Refill [https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/eudermine-activating-essence-refill-0729238196483.html]: To refill, remove cap.
   Remove ring part from reusable outer bottle. Then pull up the ring from the used inner bottle. Keeping ring level, push it down
   onto new refill bottle until it clicks in place. Insert refill into the outer container. Remove the refill cap and replace with
   outer bottle cap.


KEY INGREDIENTS

Two types of Hyaluronic Acid: Infuses skin with moisture for 24 hours, while supporting moisture retention and protecting skin.

Vitamin C: A potent and stable form of the vitamin, Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, boosts radiance for a bright, even-toned complexion.

Fermented Kefir Extract: This exclusive prebiotic promotes skin's turnover cycle while strengthening the barrier function.

Yuzu Extract: Recharges skin’s moisture.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

Created in 1897 and rooted in Japanese Beauty rituals, Eudermine was a favorite of geishas who used it to protect skin under heavy
makeup. With a double dose of Hyaluronic Acid, the ultra-hydrating formula drenches skin in moisture, and Vitamin C brightens and
evens complexion. The lightweight texture revitalizes, nourishes, and softens skin—an essential step in any Japanese Beauty
skincare routine.


RESULTS

 * Instantly boosts skin’s radiance by 17%.
 * In 4 weeks, pores, blemishes and dullness become less visible.
 * In 4 weeks, skin becomes visibly smoother by 21%.

*Tested by 33 women.

After 3 weeks of regular use of Ultimune Power Infusing Serum, Eudermine Activating Essence and Essential Energy Hydrating
Cream**:
 * 94% said skin feels more resilient.

After 3 weeks of regular use of Ultimune Power Infusing Serum, Eudermine Activating Essence and Essential Energy Hydrating
Cream**:
 * 94% said skin feels more resilient.
 * 96% said skin looks more radiant.
 * 94% said skin tone looks more even.

**Tested by 101 women.


BENEFITS

 * Infuses skin with two types of Hyaluronic Acid to stay moisturized for 24 hours.
 * Targets dark spots and brightens skin with Vitamin C.
 * Promotes skin's turnover cycle while strengthening the barrier function with exclusive prebiotic Fermented Kefir Extract.
 * Recharges moisture with Yuzu Extract.
 * Revolutionary packaging combines the bottle forming and filling process into one step, helping reduce CO2* and refill system
   helps reduce plastic by 92%.
   *Compared to other manufacturing methods.




HOW TO USE

 * Apply daily, in the morning and evening after cleansing.
 * Apply with Shiseido’s 100% natural Japanese Facial Cotton for additional exfoliation and

   container. Remove the refill cap and replace with outer bottle cap.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

A smoothing, hydrating skin softener enriched with effective ingredients to visibly plump and moisturize skin. Skin is left
feeling full, healthy looking and hydrated, making it receptive to further skincare treatment.

Exclusive InternalPowerResist technology strengthens and defends skin while Japanese ingredients provide moisturizing benefits.
This softener helps to target

pageContent:
receptive to further skincare treatment.

Exclusive InternalPowerResist technology strengthens and defends skin while Japanese ingredients provide moisturizing benefits.
This softener helps to target dryness, making it ideal for normal/dry /very dry skin types. Hydration for visibly plumped,
hydrated skin.

Normal / Dry / Very Dry Skin. DERMATOLOGIST TESTED.


HOW TO USE

 * After cleansing, pump 3 times to saturate a Shiseido Facial Cotton pad and wipe gently over face.
 * Recommended Pairings: Clarifying Cleansing Foam
   [https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/clarifying-cleansing-foam-for-all-skin-types-0730852145290.html]

   provides a high antioxidant effect.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

Softening is a key element in any Japanese beauty ritual to immediately amplify skin health and luminosity. This luxurious and
dewy anti-aging solution is packed with Japanese botanicals, including Oshima Sakura Leaf and Uji Green Tea Extracts, to
invigorate skin, perfect texture, and minimize pores for silky smooth results.

Future Solution LX contains our highest concentration of SkingenecellEnmei Complex—powered by the mystical Enmei Herb—an exclusive
anti-aging ingredient that slows down the appearance of visible signs of aging, for a perceivable difference in skin.


RESULTS

After 4 weeks,

 * 90% reported optimized skin texture
 * 89% reported renewed brightness

*Tested by 109 women.


BENEFITS

 * Immediately infuses skin with 8 hours of lasting moisture
 * Minimizes the appearance of pores and

pageContent:
optimized skin texture
 * 89% reported renewed brightness

*Tested by 109 women.


BENEFITS

 * Immediately infuses skin with 8 hours of lasting moisture
 * Minimizes the appearance of pores and refines skin's texture
 * Improves dullness for a bright, radiant glow
 * Improves the absorption of skincare products that follow
 * Dermatologist-tested


HOW TO USE

 * Apply twice daily—morning and evening.
 * Use after cleansing. Pump twice onto a cotton pad.
 * Starting from the center of the face, use outward strokes to smooth on softener:
   I. Across the forehead
   II. From nose to cheeks
   III. Around your lips
   IV. Along the jawline
   V. Upward from the base of the neck to the jaw


KEY INGREDIENTS

Enmei Herb Extract: Restores and prolongs skin’s beauty and visibly minimizes signs of aging.

Oshima Sakura Leaf Extract: Helps promote skin elasticity and supports skin’s regenerative power*.

Uji Green Tea Extract: Provides antioxidant benefits.

*In vitro test

Overview


DESCRIPTION

A light, dewy skin softener enriched with effective ingredients to remove sebum and refine skin. Skin is left feeling fresh, even
and radiant, making it receptive to further skincare treatment.

Exclusive InternalPowerResist technology strengthens and defends skin while signature Japanese ingredients provide oil removing
benefits. This softener is ideal for oily/normal

pageContent:
skincare treatment.

Exclusive InternalPowerResist technology strengthens and defends skin while signature Japanese ingredients provide oil removing
benefits. This softener is ideal for oily/normal /normal combination skin types. Oil removal for smooth, refined skin.

Oily / Normal / Normal Combination skin. DERMATOLOGIST TESTED.


HOW TO USE

 * After cleansing, pump 3 times to saturate a Shiseido Facial Cotton pad and wipe gently over face.
 * Recommend Pairings: Deep Cleansing Foam for oily skin types
   [https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/deep-cleansing-foam-for-oily-to-blemish-prone-skin-0730852145283.html] or Clarifying Cleansing
   Foam for normal skin types [https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/clarifying-cleansing-foam-for-all-skin-types-0730852145290.html].


KEY INGREDIENTS

 * InternalPowerResist technology featuring ImuCalm Compound™ helps to strengthen the skin barrier while Hamamelis Extract
   provides a high antioxidant effect.
 * Signature Japanese Ingredients
    * Kirishima

Overview


DESCRIPTION

Reveal your inner strength with radiant eyes. This eye serum makes the eye area brighter, smoother, and hydrates for 24 hours.
Newly infused with 10x concentrated extracts** of ImuGenerationRED Technology™, Ultimune Eye strengthens skin’s defenses and
supports the delivery of vital nutrients to the skin. Gentle on the delicate eye area, this non-sticky, refreshing formula
supports the natural production of collagen for a more rested and youthful appearance.


RESULTS

 * In 1 week, 96% felt dark circles were less visible
 * In 4 weeks, 100% felt the eye area was more radiant, smooth, and resilient
 * In 7 weeks (1 bottle), 100% felt wrinkles and fine lines of the eye area were less visible

*Tested by 102 women.


BENEFITS

 * Boosts radiance in 3 days*
 * Visibly diminishes

Overview


DESCRIPTION

See and feel ultimate resilience like you've never experienced before. This lightweight, fast-absorbing intensive treatment
contains 15x the concentration of Ultimune Power Infusing Concentrate's key ingredients to help strengthen skin's defenses and
protect skin from environmental damage. Achieve healthy, vibrant looking skin with enhanced radiance and smoothness.


RESULTS

After 4 weeks*,
 * 96% agree skin looks smoother
 * 96% agree skin looks more radiant
 * 95% agree skin looks more even toned
 * 94% agree fine lines are less visible

*Tested by 111 participants.


BENEFITS

 * Boosts skin's radiance, smoothness, and resilience
 * Defends from environmental aggressors
 * Lightweight texture absorbs quickly
 * Suitable for all skin types
 * Paraben-free. Mineral-oil free.
 * Non-comedogenic.

metadata.title: Ultimune Power Shot Strengthening Face Serum | SHISEIDO
metadata.description: Try SHISEIDO's Ultimune Power Shot Strengthening Serum: an intensive face serum treatment to achieve smoother, radiant skin in four weeks.

pageContent:
smoothness, and resilience
 * Defends from environmental aggressors
 * Lightweight texture absorbs quickly
 * Suitable for all skin types
 * Paraben-free. Mineral-oil free.
 * Non-comedogenic. Dermatologist-tested.


HOW TO USE

 * Use twice a week or whenever your skin has been under extra stress or needs an extra boost.
 * Apply after cleansing and softening, in place of Ultimune Power Infusing Concentrate. Continue to use Ultimune Power Infusing
   Concentrate as your daily serum, on days when not using Ultimune Power Shot.
 * Push bottom button to dispense and smooth evenly over face.


KEY INGREDIENTS

 * 15x concentration of Ultimune Power Infusing Concentrate's key ingredients (Reishi Mushroom, Iris Root, Fermented Roselle
   Extract): Enhances skin's defenses to help resist environmental damage.
 * Tsubaki Seed Extract: Rich in antioxidants to help strengthen skin's defenses.

Overview


OUR #1 SERUM

The culmination of over 150 years of Japanese skincare innovation. Discover 3 visible changes in 3 days: radiance, resilience, and
smoothness*. Ultimune face serum is powered by collagen-supporting peptides as well as nourishing and smoothing antioxidants to
strengthen skin’s protective barrier, leaving it smoother and plumper. Smooth fine lines in just 4 weeks** with Ultimune Power
Infusing Serum. Now available in a refill size.


BENEFITS:

 * Boosts radiance, resilience, and smoothness
 * Reduces signs of aging
 * Improves hydration
 * Enhances the efficacy of other skincare products
 * Winner of 238 global beauty awards
 * Refill helps reduce plastic waste by up to 95% compared to a regular product
 * Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

*Consumer tested by

RESULTS:

 * In 3 days, skin is more radiant, resilient, and smooth*
 * In 4 weeks, fine lines are smoothed**

*Consumer tested by 103 women.
**Consumer tested by 90 individuals.


HOW TO USE

 * FOR REFILL: Save the pump and cap from your original bottle. Insert the pump into the refill, then close cap.
 * Use Ultimune after cleansing and softening skin, but before applying other serums or moisturizers.
 * Pump twice onto fingertips and smooth evenly over face and neck.
 * Use Ultimune twice daily, morning and evening.
 * Click here [https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/ultimune-power-infusing-serum-9990000000213.html] to shop Ultimune Power Infusing

KEY INGREDIENTS

   abilities.
 * HYDROXYPROLINE: A collagen-supporting peptide known to reduce visible lines and wrinkles.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

The culmination of 150 years of Japanese skincare innovation, Ultimune face serum delivers 2x skin‘s defenses** with
ImuGenerationRED Technology™. Vital nutrients are fed to the skin, visibly reducing signs of aging, amplifying hydration, and
boosting radiance in 3 days*. Now available in a refill size.


BENEFITS:

 * Reduces signs of aging
 * Improves hydration
 * Boosts radiance
 * Enhances the

signs of aging, amplifying hydration, and
boosting radiance in 3 days*. Now available in a refill size.


BENEFITS:

 * Reduces signs of aging
 * Improves hydration
 * Boosts radiance
 * Enhances the efficacy of other skincare products
 * Winner of 224 global beauty awards
 * Refill helps reduce plastic waste by up to 95% compared with a regular product
 * Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

*Tested by 104 women.
**Based on the improvement of moisture-retention rate and transepidermal water loss.


RESULTS

 * In 3 days, skin becomes more radiant*
 * In 1 month, skin becomes more resilient and firm**
 * After 1 bottle, wrinkles are visibly reduced***

*Tested by 104 women.
**Tested by 115 women.
***Based on a 50mL bottle.


HOW TO USE

 * Use Ultimune after cleansing and softening skin, but before applying any other serums or moisturizers.
 * Pump twice onto your fingertips and smooth evenly over face and neck.
 * Use Ultimune twice daily, morning and night.

KEY INGREDIENTS

 * HEARTLEAF EXTRACT: An Eastern ancient herb that soothes skin and strengthens its protective barrier. Detoxifies skin while
   optimizing oxygenation.
 * REISHI MUSHROOM: Rich in antioxidants and polysaccharides, it hydrates and protects to visibly reduce signs of aging.
 * IRIS ROOT EXTRACT: Known to survive in extreme temperatures, this hardy plant is recognized for its vitality and moisturizing

metadata.title: Ultimune Radiance and Hydration Skincare Gift Set | SHISEIDO
metadata.description: Achieve a glowing complexion in just three days with our skincare gift set. Featuring our top-rated Ultimune Power Infusing Antioxidant Serum and more.

pageContent:
* Ultimune Eye Power Infusing Eye Concentrate, 5mL
   [https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/ultimune-eye-power-infusing-eye-concentrate-0730852172890.html]


HOW TO USE

 * Ultimune Power Infusing Serum: Use morning and evening after cleansing and softening, but before moisturizing. Dispense onto
   fingertips and smooth evenly over face and neck.
 * Deep Cleansing Foam: Use morning and evening as the first step of your skincare routine. Dispense a pearl-sized amount and add
   cold or lukewarm water to lather and cleanse. Rinse thoroughly.
 * Treatment Softener: Use morning and evening after cleansing. Dispense onto facial cotton and smooth over face.
 * Essential Energy Hydrating Day Cream SPF 20: Use in the morning at least 15 minutes before sun exposure. Gently smooth cream
   outward over face.
 * Ultimune Eye Power Infusing Eye Concentrate: Use morning and evening after cleansing and softening. Dot and smooth around the
   eye area.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

Awaken soft, supple skin with this moisturizing cream featuring Ginseng Root Extract and our proprietary Hyaluronic Acid that
strengthens skin’s barrier. Sensitive skin-friendly, it visibly reduces the appearance of pores and fine lines after 4 weeks.**
Reduce waste by replenishing with refill pods.




RESULTS:



Immediately,

 * 92% of users felt the cream moisturized their skin
 * 93% of users felt the cream was airy-soft and spreads smoothly on skin

After 4 weeks,

 * 90% of users felt the cream made their skin soft and supple
 * 88% of users felt the cream makes their skin plump

**Tested by 107 females, ages 25-39




BENEFITS:



 * Deep, intense hydration that lasts 24-hours*
 * Supports skin’s natural production of Hyaluronic Acid
 * Strengthens skin’s

their skin plump

BENEFITS:



 * Deep, intense hydration that lasts 24-hours*
 * Supports skin’s natural production of Hyaluronic Acid
 * Strengthens skin’s moisture barrier
 * Sensitive skin-friendly. Ideal for all skin types.
 * Refill helps reduce plastic waste by up to 81% compared with a regular product
 * Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.
 * Free of Mineral Oil

*Tested by 22 females, ages 38-59.
**Tested by 107 females, ages 25-39.


HOW TO USE

REFILL DIRECTIONS: Hold the jar with one hand and place your fingers on the protrusions on the mouth of the cap and lift out the
pod. Set the new refill in place and firmly push into the jar. Peel off the inner sticker and firmly close the cap. Use the
spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the 5 points of your face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
Gently smooth the cream outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount on your neck, and sweep

metadata.title: Essential Energy Hydrating Cream Refill | SHISEIDO

pageContent:
then dot the cream on the 5 points of your face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
Gently smooth the cream outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount on your neck, and sweep the cream upward
from throat to jawline. Use twice daily—morning & night, as the last step in your skincare routine. Click here
[https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/essential-energy-hydrating-cream-9990000000212.html] to shop Essential Energy Hydrating Cream


KEY INGREDIENTS

PURIFIED & MICRONIZED HYALURONIC ACID: Delivers, attracts, and retains moisture. GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT: Offers energizing and
soothing properties to supports the natural production of Hyaluronic Acid and strengthens skin’s moisture barrier.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

Awaken soft, supple skin with this moisturizing cream featuring Ginseng Root Extract and our proprietary Hyaluronic Acid that
strengthens skin’s barrier. Sensitive skin-friendly, it visibly reduces the appearance of pores and fine lines after 4 weeks.**
Reduce waste by replenishing with refill

Hyaluronic Acid that
strengthens skin’s barrier. Sensitive skin-friendly, it visibly reduces the appearance of pores and fine lines after 4 weeks.**
Reduce waste by replenishing with refill pods.




RESULTS:



Immediately,

 * 92% of users felt the cream moisturized their skin
 * 93% of users felt the cream was airy-soft and spreads smoothly on skin

After 4 weeks,

 * 90% of users felt the cream made their skin soft and supple
 * 88% of users felt the cream makes their skin plump

**Tested by 107 females, ages 25-39




BENEFITS:



 * Deep, intense hydration that lasts 24-hours*
 * Supports skin’s natural production of Hyaluronic Acid
 * Strengthens skin’s moisture barrier
 * Sensitive skin-friendly. Ideal for all skin types.
 * Refill helps reduce plastic waste by up to 81% compared with a regular product
 * Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.
 * Free of Mineral Oil

*Tested by 22 females, ages 38-59.
**Tested by 107 females, ages 25-39.

with a regular product
 * Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

*Tested by 22 females, ages 38-59.
**Tested by 107 females, ages 25-39.


HOW TO USE

Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the 5 points of your face: forehead, nose, chin, and both
cheeks. Gently smooth the cream outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount on your neck, and sweep the cream
upward from throat to jawline. Use twice daily—morning & night, as the last step in your skincare routine. FOR REFILL
[https://www.shiseido.com/us/en/essential-energy-hydrating-cream-refill-0729238182868.html]: Hold the jar with one hand and place
your fingers on the protrusions on the mouth of the cap and lift out the pod. Set the new refill in place and firmly push into the
jar. Peel off the inner sticker and firmly close the cap.

Overview


DESCRIPTION

Awaken soft, supple skin with this SPF gel-cream featuring Ginseng Root Extract and our proprietary Hyaluronic Acid to deliver
deep, intense hydration so skin is protected and ready for makeup. Sensitive skin-friendly, it also minimizes the appearance of
pores and fine lines.

BENEFITS:

 * Deep, intense hydration that lasts 24-hours*
 * Broad-spectrum SPF 20 protection
 * Encourages skin’s natural production of Hyaluronic Acid
 * Sensitive skin-friendly. Ideal for all skin types.
 * Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.
 * Free of Mineral Oil


*Tested by 22 females, ages 38-59.


HOW TO USE

Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the 5 points of the face: forehead, nose, chin, and both
cheeks. Gently smooth the cream outward over

metadata.title: Essential Energy Hydrating Day Cream Broad Spectrum SPF 20 | SHISEIDO

pageContent:
ages 38-59.


HOW TO USE

Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the 5 points of the face: forehead, nose, chin, and both
cheeks. Gently smooth the cream outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck, and sweep the cream
upward from throat to jawline. Apply daily as the last step in your morning skincare routine.


KEY INGREDIENTS

PURIFIED & MICRONIZED HYALURONIC ACID: Delivers, attracts, and retains moisture. GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT: Offers energizing and
soothing properties to supports the natural production of Hyaluronic Acid and strengthens skin’s moisture barrier.

GET STARTED, IT'S EASY!

or 4 months).*
2

adjustments.

*You must be logged into your account when selecting a auto-replenishment cycle.

WHAT ELSE DO YOU NEED TO KNOW?

You may change the auto-replenishment cycle of your products after receiving your first auto-replenishment shipment or cancel at
any time, up to 24 hours before your next shipment of your Shiseido auto-replenishment order.

Auto-Replenishment orders are billed to your default billing address and shipped to your default shipping address.

To edit this information, please go to the Auto-Replenishment page in the My Account section of Shiseido.com or contact Customer
Service by calling 1.866.758.5966 [tel:8667585966] or by emailing customerservice@shiseidousa.com
[customerservice@shiseidousa.com].

20. CALIFORNIA TRANSPARENCY IN SUPPLY CHAIN ACT DISCLOSURE

On January 1, 2012, the California Transparency in Supply Chain Act went into effect in California. This act requires retail
sellers and manufacturers doing business in California to disclose the efforts made to ensure its supply chains are free from
slavery and human trafficking in effort to eradicate slavery and human trafficking from product supply chains.

Shiseido Cosmetics is committed to being responsible in its global business practices and takes steps with its product suppliers
to ensure compliance with Shiseido Cosmetics’ standards of conduct as set forth in Shiseido Group Supplier Code of Conduct, of
which Shiseido Cosmetics is a part, and all applicable laws. Shiseido Cosmetics has made the following efforts to ensure
compliance by its product suppliers:

Certification: Shiseido Cosmetics requires all product suppliers to confirm in writing that

metadata.title: Terms and Conditions | SHISEIDO
metadata.description: Learn about Shiseido's Terms and Conditions.

pageContent:
laws. Shiseido Cosmetics has made the following efforts to ensure
compliance by its product suppliers:

Certification: Shiseido Cosmetics requires all product suppliers to confirm in writing that they understand and will adhere to the
Shiseido Group Supplier Code of Conduct. The Shiseido Group Supplier Code of Conduct specifically requires product suppliers to
certify that all goods are manufactured in compliance with the wage and hour, slavery and human trafficking laws of the country of
manufacture and without the use of children or prison, indentured, exploited, bonded, forced or slave labor.

Training: The Shiseido Group’s global procurement and supply chain management teams are trained on the Shiseido Group Supplier
Code of Conduct and how to identify possible indicators of human trafficking and slavery in the supply chain to ensure that no
risk factors are present.

Audits & Verification: The Shiseido Group’s global procurement and supply chain management teams have the ability

metadata.title: Terms and Conditions | SHISEIDO
metadata.description: Learn about Shiseido's Terms and Conditions.

pageContent:
and slavery in the supply chain to ensure that no
risk factors are present.

Audits & Verification: The Shiseido Group’s global procurement and supply chain management teams have the ability to audit product
suppliers either itself or conduct an independent third party assessment, including conducting on-site inspections to assess
factory conditions and ensure that management is not in violation of slavery and human-trafficking laws.

Accountability: Shiseido Cosmetics will not do business with any supplier who will not agree to comply with the Shiseido Global
Supplier Code of Conduct or its other accountability standards. Shiseido Cosmetics will issue a warning to any supplier, employee
or contractor who willfully or knowingly fails to comply with these standards and, if the supplier, employee, or contractor fails
to take prompt corrective action, Shiseido Cosmetics will enforce disciplinary action including termination of the business
relationship.

Shiseido Cosmetics is dedicated

metadata.title: Terms and Conditions | SHISEIDO
metadata.description: Learn about Shiseido's Terms and Conditions.

pageContent:
or contractor fails
to take prompt corrective action, Shiseido Cosmetics will enforce disciplinary action including termination of the business
relationship.

Shiseido Cosmetics is dedicated to conducting its business with integrity and the highest standard of ethics and seeks the same
level of integrity and ethical standards with its vendor and supplier partners. Shiseido Cosmetics will continue to assess all
risks and opportunities to ensure that its approach will prevent any injustice or violation of human rights within its supply
chain.
